nl.corebooster.setup

Class Sprite

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.corebooster.setup.Sprite

  • public class Sprite
extends java.lang.Object
    Describes a tile from the game with an X and Y position
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Raymon de Looff, Thijs Clowting, Richard Weug

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructs a new sprite from an image with a trigger

    • Constructor Detail

      • Sprite

        public Sprite(java.lang.String folder,
              java.lang.String filename,
              boolean isCollidable,
              int x,
              int y)
       throws org.newdawn.slick.SlickException
        Constructs a new sprite from an image
        Parameters:
        folder - The folder where the sprite is located
        filename - The filename of the sprite
        isCollidable - Depends if you can collide with the sprite or not, true/false
        x - The initial x position of the sprite
        y - The initial y position of the sprite
        Throws:
        org.newdawn.slick.SlickException - Indicates a failure to initialize the display

      • Sprite

        public Sprite(java.lang.String folder,
              java.lang.String filename,
              boolean isCollidable,
              TriggerBox.TriggerType triggerType,
              java.lang.String triggerValue,
              int triggerMargin,
              int x,
              int y)
       throws org.newdawn.slick.SlickException
        Constructs a new sprite from an image with a trigger
        Parameters:
        folder - The folder where the sprite is located
        filename - The filename of the sprite
        isCollidable - Depends if you can collide with the sprite or not, true/false
        triggerType - The type of trigger called when collided, SCENESWITCH/MESSAGE/ANIMATE
        triggerValue - The value of the trigger called when collided
        triggerMargin - The margin of the trigger box
        x - The initial x position of the sprite
        y - The initial y position of the sprite
        Throws:
        org.newdawn.slick.SlickException - Indicates a failure to initialize the display
